com.pusher.platform.feeds

Class Feed

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pusher.platform.feeds.Feed

  • public class Feed
extends java.lang.Object
    A single feed. Can be subscribed to, unsubscribed from, or used to fetch a number of items in it. It can also append items. What more could you wish fore?

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  Feed.Builder

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(OnItemListener onItemListener,
                      OnErrorListener onErrorListener)
        The simplest-possible way to subscribe to a feed. This fetches the last items in the feed, oldest to newest and then any new items as they get appended to the feed.
        Parameters:
        onItemListener - The callback that triggers for each new item in a feed.
        onErrorListener - Error callback

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(OnOpenListener onOpenListener,
                      OnItemListener onItemListener,
                      OnErrorListener onErrorListener,
                      java.lang.String lastItemId)
        Subscribe to a feed, from the last item specified with ID
        Parameters:
        onItemListener - The callback that triggers for each new item in a feed.
        onErrorListener - Error callback
        onOpenListener - Callback that triggers when the subscription is opened
        lastItemId - the ID of the last item we are subscribing from

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe()
        Unsubscribe from the current subscription
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if it's not subscribed.

      • append

        public void append(java.util.List<Item> items)
        Appends the list of items to the current feed.
        Parameters:
        items - the list of items to append.

      • append

        public void append(Item item)
        Appends the item to the current feed.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to append.

      • fetchOlderItems

        public void fetchOlderItems(OnItemsListener listener)
        Utility method to fetch the last _n_ items from the last currently known item in the feed.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that triggers on each retrieved item

      • fetchOlderItems

        public void fetchOlderItems(int limit,
                            OnItemsListener listener)
        Utility method to fetch the previous _limit_ items from the last currently known item in the feed
        Parameters:
        limit - number of items to fetch. If a feed has less than that items it will fetch as many as it can
        listener - the callback that triggers on each retrieved item

      • fetchItems

        public void fetchItems(java.lang.String oldestItemId,
                       int limit,
                       OnItemsListener listener)
        Method for fetching the previous _limit_ items, starting with the item with _lastItemId_
        Parameters:
        oldestItemId - the oldest retrieved item in this feed
        limit - number of items to fetch. If a feed has less than that items it will fetch as many as it can. If this value is negative or zero it will use server-default value.
        listener - the callback that triggers on each retrieved item
